sentences.english: The Double Nine Festival is the festival for the elderly.
sentences.chinese: 重陽節是老年人的節日。

sentences.english: Longevity and for banquets, constitute the basis for the Chung Yeung Festival.

sentences.english: Today is September ninth by lunar calendar. It's the Double Ninth Festival.
sentences.chinese: 今天是農曆九月初九，是重陽節。

sentences.chinese: 待到重陽日，還來就菊花。

sentences.english: In the Chung Yeung public life into summer and winter time of the handover landmark.
sentences.chinese: 重陽在民衆生活中成爲夏冬交接的時間界標。

sentences.english: The 9th day of September in the lunar calendar is "the Chinese Chong Yang Festival" and a happy occasion in autumn.
sentences.chinese: 農曆九月初九是“中國的重陽節”和秋天快樂的時光。

sentences.english: Yanjing Suishiji (Yanjing Age in Mind) described it as "mutton-roasting and cake-sharing".
sentences.chinese: 《燕京歲時記》裏就提到在重陽節要“烤肉分糕”。

sentences.english: Chongyang the source, dating back to before the Qin Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 重陽的源頭，可追溯到先秦之前。

sentences.english: One is Sima, three years old to see chongyang.
sentences.chinese: 一爲州司馬，三見歲重陽。

sentences.english: As a result, the Chung Yeung Festival on the origin, there are all kinds of different versions.
sentences.chinese: 因此，關於重陽節的起源，有種種不同的說法。

sentences.english: It is also the traditional customs to wear cornel and appreciate chrysanthemums.
sentences.chinese: 插茱萸和賞菊也是重陽節的傳統習俗。

sentences.english: Why 9th September in lunar calendar is called 'Chong Yang' Festival?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼稱農曆九月初九爲“重陽節”？

sentences.english: And the associated high Chongyang have to eat cake custom.
sentences.chinese: 和登高相聯繫的有喫重陽糕的風俗。

sentences.english: This is '99 Double Ninth Festival proceeds from a Beijing University student's unique proposal.
sentences.chinese: 這是99重陽節從北京大學的一名學生的獨特的建議。

sentences.english: People climb up high at every Double Ninth Festival in China.
sentences.chinese: 在中國，人們有九九重陽節登高的習俗。

sentences.english: It is also the traditional custom to wear cornel and admire chrysanthemums.
